Q8_alternative_test: Genetic testing for facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD) only
Q17: The policy only addresses coverage for genetic testing specific to facioscapulohumeral muscular dystrophy (FSHD), not for limb-girdle muscular dystrophy panels. To submit a claim for FSHD genetic testing, ensure the patient meets clinical criteria for FSHD, use the appropriate CPT code (81404), and confirm benefit eligibility under the member’s health plan. For other muscular dystrophy panels, coverage is not addressed in this policy and would require review under a different or more relevant policy.
